verses.verse: But it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> within a <S%H4480>while<s%> <S%H3117><s%> after, in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> that <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> with a <S%H1423>kid;<s%> <S%H5795><s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H802>wife<s%> into the <S%H2315>chamber.<s%> But her <S%H1>father<s%> would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>suffer<s%> him to go <S%H935>in.<s%>

And her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I verily <S%H559>thought<s%> <S%H559><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hadst utterly <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H8130><s%> her; therefore I <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to thy <S%H4828>companion:<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H2896>fairer<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> she? <S%H1961>take<s%> her, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of her.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> concerning them, <S%H6471>Now<s%> shall I be more <S%H5352>blameless<s%> than the <S%H4480>Philistines,<s%> <S%H6430><s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5973><s%> them a <S%H7451>displeasure.<s%>

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>caught<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7776>foxes,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3940>firebrands,<s%> and <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H2180>tail<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2180>tail,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3940>firebrand<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2180>tails.<s%>

And when he had <S%H1197>set<s%> the <S%H3940>brands<s%> on <S%H784>fire,<s%> he let them <S%H7971>go<s%> into the standing <S%H7054>corn<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and burnt <S%H1197>up<s%> both the <S%H4480>shocks,<s%> <S%H1430><s%> and <S%H5704>also<s%> the standing <S%H7054>corn,<s%> <S%H5704>with<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H2132>olives.<s%>

Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this?<s%> And they <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> the <S%H2860>son-in-law<s%> of the <S%H8554>Timnite,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> her to his <S%H4828>companion.<s%> And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> her and her <S%H1>father<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H518>Though<s%> ye have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> <S%H3588>yet<s%> <S%H518><s%> will I be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> of you, and after <S%H310>that<s%> I will <S%H2308>cease.<s%>

And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> them <S%H7785>hip<s%> <S%H5921>and<s%> <S%H3409>thigh<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter:<s%> and he went <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5585>top<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H5862>Etam.<s%>
Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and spread <S%H5203>themselves<s%> in <S%H3896>Lehi.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> are ye come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us? And they <S%H559>answered,<s%> To <S%H631>bind<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> are we come <S%H5927>up,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to him <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> to us.

Then <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4480>Judah<s%> <S%H3063><s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5585>top<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H5862>Etam,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> <S%H3045>Knowest<s%> thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are <S%H4910>rulers<s%> over us? <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> unto us? And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H834>As<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> unto me, <S%H3651>so<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> unto them.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, We are come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H631>bind<s%> thee, that we may <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H7650>Swear<s%> unto me, <S%H6435>that<s%> ye will not <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon me <S%H859>yourselves.<s%>

And they <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3808>No;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> we will bind thee <S%H631>fast,<s%> <S%H631><s%> and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee into their <S%H3027>hand:<s%> but surely we will not <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H4191><s%> thee. And they <S%H631>bound<s%> him with <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>cords,<s%> and brought him <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5553>rock.<s%>

And when <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H3896>Lehi,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him: and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H6743>mightily<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and the <S%H5688>cords<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H2220>arms<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> as <S%H6593>flax<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H1197>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and his <S%H612>bands<s%> <S%H4549>loosed<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And he <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H2961>new<s%> <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> it, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> therewith.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> With the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> heaps upon <S%H2565>heaps,<s%> <S%H2565><s%> with the <S%H3895>jaw<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass<s%> have I <S%H5221>slain<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> that he cast <S%H7993>away<s%> the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> out of his <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7437>Ramath-lehi.<s%>

And he was sore <S%H6770>athirst,<s%> <S%H3966><s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> hast <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant:<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> shall I <S%H4191>die<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised?<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1234>cleaved<s%> <S%H853><s%> a hollow <S%H4388>place<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H3895>jaw,<s%> and there <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H4480>therefrom;<s%> and when he had <S%H8354>drunk,<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> came <S%H7725>again,<s%> and he <S%H2421>revived:<s%> <S%H5921>wherefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof <S%H5875>En-hakkore,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3896>Lehi<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
